snippet: The case against the 10 bloggers and journalists became a rallying cry for critics of Ethiopia’s government, who accused it of stifling free speech
abstract: Ethiopian court acquits defendants accused of terrorism in widely followed freedom of press case; arrests of defendants, mostly contributors to government-disparaging blog called Zone 9, became rally point against government efforts to discourage free speech.
lead_paragraph: The case against the 10 bloggers and journalists became a rallying cry for critics of Ethiopia’s government, who accused it of stifling free speech

headline.main: Ethiopian Bloggers Cleared of Terrorism Charges
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Ethiopia: Acquittals for Journalists
